A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was not the star wars we should have gotten. I even went back to the theaters to watch episode 1-3 multiple times... I won't be going back for this one. Rian Johnson took a massive dump on all the characters we know and love. Moving on ia one thing\, but TFA was a true star wars movie heading the saga into new and exciting characters with our classic favorites giving us that warm fuzzy feeling. The more I think about it the more mad I get.
